name: SAO Utils: Beta
description: SAO Utils provides you a customizable Full-Dive 3D app launcher with varieties of themes, desktop widgets and powerful utilities.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® Vista or above Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo or AMD Phenom™ X3 processor or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9 and OpenGL 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 512 MB available space
